Fris√∏r s√∏ges til Helin Hair ‚Äì Bliv en del af et passioneret og b√¶redygtigt team  üåø 
 Helin Hair er en voksende fris√∏rk√¶de med snart fem saloner, prim√¶rt beliggende i Nordsj√¶lland. Vi er kendt for vores passionerede og veluddannede fris√∏rer, der str√¶ber efter at levere den h√∏jeste kvalitet inden for h√•rpleje, farvebehandlinger, klip og styling.  B√¶redygtighed er en kernev√¶rdi for os, og vi er stolte af, at vores saloner er 96% gr√∏nne.  ‚ôªÔ∏è Vi reducerer aktivt vores milj√∏aftryk ved at bruge milj√∏venlige produkter, minimere affald og prioritere energieffektive l√∏sninger. Vi arbejder udelukkende med kvalitets- og b√¶redygtige m√¶rker som  Goldwell, KMS, Muran og Kerasilk. 
 Vi s√∏ger nu en dygtig fris√∏r, der vil v√¶re med til at forts√¶tte vores succes og bidrage til en gr√∏nnere fremtid, samtidig med at vi leverer topkvalitet til vores kunder. 
üå± Vi tilbyder dig:
 ‚úÖ En fast fuldtids-/deltidsstilling ‚úÖ Et kreativt og b√¶redygtigt arbejdsmilj√∏ med stort r√•derum til dine id√©er ‚úÖ Arbejde med markedets f√∏rende og milj√∏venlige produkter:  Goldwell, KMS, Muran og Kerasilk ‚úÖ Mulighed for l√∏bende efteruddannelse og deltagelse i kurser, herunder b√¶redygtige teknikker ‚úÖ En st√¶rk faglig og international kultur med fokus p√• samarbejde, udvikling og  gr√∏nne initiativer ‚úÖ Attraktiv l√∏npakke og gode personalefordele ‚úÖ Grundig opl√¶ring og introduktion til vores  produkter og b√¶redygtige praksisser ‚úÖ En arbejdsplads, der aktivt reducerer vand- og energiforbrug og arbejder mod at minimere affald 
üçÉ Vi forventer af dig:
 üåç Uddannet fris√∏r med svendebrev üåç Erfaring med b√•de dame- og herreklip, farvning og styling üåç En stor passion for  h√•r, kundeservice og b√¶redygtighed üåç Lyst til at udvikle dig gennem efteruddannelse og f√∏lge de nyeste  gr√∏nne trends i branchen üåç Skal kunne tale og forst√• dansk eller engelsk üåç Evnen til at arbejde selvst√¶ndigt, men ogs√• som en del af et  engageret og milj√∏bevidst team 
 Er du klar til at tage n√¶ste skridt i din karriere og blive en del af vores  gr√∏nne og passionerede team ? üå± S√• send din ans√∏gning og CV til  job@helinhair.dk  snarest muligt.

 ----------------------------------------- 
 Hairdresser Wanted for Helin Hair ‚Äì Join a Passionate and Sustainable Team  üåø 
 Helin Hair is a growing hairdressing chain with soon-to-be five salons, primarily located in North Zealand. We are known for our passionate and well-trained hairdressers who strive to deliver the highest quality in hair care, coloring, cutting, and styling.  Sustainability is a core value for us, and we are proud to run salons that are 96% green.  ‚ôªÔ∏è We actively reduce our environmental footprint by using eco-friendly products, minimizing waste, and prioritizing energy-efficient solutions. We work exclusively with high-quality and sustainable brands such as  Goldwell, KMS, Muran, and Kerasilk. 
 We are now looking for a skilled hairdresser who wants to continue our success and contribute to a greener future while delivering top-quality services to our customers. 
üå± We offer you:
 ‚úÖ A permanent full-time/part-time position ‚úÖ A creative and sustainable work environment with great freedom to explore your ideas ‚úÖ Work with the market‚Äôs leading and eco-friendly products:  Goldwell, KMS, Muran, and Kerasilk ‚úÖ Opportunities for ongoing training and participation in courses, including sustainability-focused education ‚úÖ A strong professional international culture focusing on collaboration, development, and  green initiatives ‚úÖ An attractive salary package and great employee benefits ‚úÖ Thorough training and introduction to our  products and sustainable practices ‚úÖ A workplace where we actively reduce water and energy consumption and work towards zero waste 
üçÉ We expect from you:
 üåç Certified hairdresser with a diploma üåç Experience in both men's and women's haircuts, coloring, and styling üåç A great passion for  hair, customer service, and sustainability üåç Willingness to develop through further education and stay updated on the latest  eco-friendly hairdressing techniques üåç Ability to speak and understand Danish or English üåç Capability to work independently as well as part of an  engaged and environmentally conscious team 
 Are you ready to take the next step in your career and become part of our  sustainable and passionate team ? üå± Then send your application and CV to  job@helinhair.dk  as soon as possible. 
 If you have any questions about the position, feel free to contact  Charlotte Hein Pedersen at +45 21990202 . 
 üåø  We look forward to hearing from you!  üåø
